description.narrative: The public has knowledge about child rights and knows how to become engaged to protect them., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, society's commitment to respect and promote child rights in Uruguay strengthened

sector.narrative: Advocacy and partnership-building for social behaviour change
Innovation, multi-media content production and dissemination
Technical assistance - Cross-sectoral communication for development

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The public has knowledge about child rights and knows how to become engaged to protect them.

description.narrative: UNICEF Uruguay contributed to improving knowledge on children's rights engaging political leaders on the main issues affecting children and raising awareness in society on the challenges that still remain. Only on Facebook, UNICEF Uruguay's messages had more than 81 million impressions (29 million more than in 2018). | Status:On-track | As-of Date:16/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of people reached on COVID-19 through messaging on prevention and access to services [COVIDSitRep]
